title: Technical Consultant and Account Manager
description: Started as Junior Account Manager and quickly advanced to a combined role as Account Manager and Technical Consultant, responsible for both customer contact and technical support.
Advised and guided clients in their migration to Azure, with responsibilities for drafting migration plans, technical documentation, and hands-on support during implementation.
Coordinated and led project teams for cloud projects, acting as a liaison between the client and the technical team.
Performed supporting operational tasks such as contract management and procurement, and worked closely with marketing teams and external agencies to optimally serve client needs.
Obtained Microsoft AZ-900 certificate to better support clients with in-depth cloud knowledge.
Utilized Terraform to manage DNS records in Cloudflare more efficiently.

title: IT Consultant
description: Built websites for various local entrepreneurs, hosted on a self-built cloud platform based on Terraform, Ansible, Ubuntu, and DigitalOcean.
Provided IT consultancy for local companies and was hired by Managed Service Providers (MSPs).
Developed a website and provided network support with Ubiquiti Unifi installations and management for various clients for Phonex Communicatie.

title: Intern DevOps Engineer
description: Responsible for the daily management and updates of a mission-critical platform in Google Cloud, focused on the European and American markets.
Scaled infrastructure during holidays to handle increased traffic, with strategic deployment of cloud resources.
Worked in an environment with automated provisioning and configuration management, set up with Terraform and Ansible, enhancing platform reliability and uptime.
Executed migration of VM-based applications to Docker containers, promoting modernization and more efficient platform management.
Responsible for uptime management and participated in the on-call duty to ensure 24/7 availability and proactively resolve incidents.
Conducted research on a critical PHP security bug, tested and implemented solutions.
Tested and implemented Cloud Load Balancer for better traffic distribution and increased scalability.
Applied a significant patch in Nginx, logging user IP addresses instead of the load balancer's, providing a more accurate view of traffic flows and improving troubleshooting capabilities.
Built software images with Packer, based on an Ansible playbook, an Ubuntu image, and the necessary web stack (PHP, Nginx, Redis Cache, JavaScript).
Managed Google Cloud databases and object storage buckets.
Responsible for the protection and control of backups in line with the backup policy set by the CTO.
